recipesJson.name: Bilí Bilí (Cherry-Infused Rum)
recipesJson.author: besejuiced
recipesJson.description:
Bilí is a popular drink from Vieques, a small island off the coast of Puerto Rico. Traditionally, it’s made by fermenting rum with quenepas, a local tropical fruit. However,i expand the infusing concept with other fruits. In this one, cherries, orange, lemon & Lime, cucumber and spiced cinnamon are macerated with sugar before infusing dark rum.

This is a digestif that packs a real punch, a very refreshing vape

FLV Rich Cinnamon 2 drops per 15ml!

S/V let it sit 24 hours, better or perfect 3 days.

Share and rate this if you like it.
